mapper.select: WITH time_range AS ( SELECT TO_CHAR(now(), 'YYYYMMDDHH24') as start_time, TO_CHAR(now() + INTERVAL '1' DAY, 'YYYYMMDDHH24') as end_time ) SELECT category, fcst_value, fcst_date || fcst_time || '00' as fcst_datetime FROM short_forecast sf JOIN time_range tr WHERE nx = #{nx} AND ny = #{ny} AND fcst_value != '-999' AND category IN ('TMP', 'SKY', 'POP', 'PCP') AND fcst_date || fcst_time BETWEEN tr.start_time AND tr.end_time AND base_date = TO_CHAR(TRUNC(now()), 'YYYYMMDD') ORDER BY fcst_date, fcst_time, category

SELECT A.STN, A.TM_EF, A.SKY, A.PRE, A.CONF, A.WF, A.RN_ST, A.MIN_TEMP, A.MAX_TEMP, A.MIN_L, A.MIN_H, A.MAX_L, A.MAX_H FROM MID_FORECAST A WHERE A.TM_EF BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TRUNC(now() + INTERVAL '1' DAY), 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(TRUNC(now() + INTERVAL '7' DAY), 'YYYYMMDD') AND A.STN = #{stationId} ORDER BY A.TM_EF
SELECT TM_EF, WRN, LVL, CMD, GRD, CNT FROM weather_warn WHERE TM_FC > TRUNC(now()) AND STN = #{stationId}

WITH ranked_data AS ( SELECT code, fcst_date, fcst_value, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY code ORDER BY ABS( TIMESTAMPDIFF('MINUTE', NOW(), PARSEDATETIME(fcst_date, 'yyyyMMddHH') ) ) ) AS rn FROM environmental_index WHERE area_no = #{areaNo} ) SELECT code, fcst_date, fcst_value FROM ranked_data WHERE rn = 1 ORDER BY code
